C:\\Users\\Alienaz\\Desktop\\beflow_test.serviceRawFile:
org: alienaz
app: product-management
service: product-management

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs16.x
  environment:
    MONGO_URI: ${env:MONGO_URI}

functions:
  createProduct:
    handler: src/application/handler_products.handleCreateProduct
    timeout: 15
    events:
      - http:
          path: products/create
          method: post

  deleteProduct:
    handler: src/application/handler_products.handleDeleteProductById
    timeout: 15
    events:
      - http:
          path: products/delete
          method: delete
          request:
            parameters:
              paths:
                id: true

  editProduct:
  handler: src/application/handler_products.handleEditProductById
  timeout: 15
  events:
    - http:
        path: products/edit
        method: put
        request:
          body:
            required: true
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                id:
                  type: string
                name:
                  type: string
                price:
                  type: number
                category:
                  type: string

  searchProducts:
    handler: src/application/handler_products.handleSearchProducts
    timeout: 15
    events:
      - http:
          path: products/search
          method: get
          request:
            querystrings:
              name: true
              category: true

plugins:
  - serverless-dotenv-plugin
  - serverless-offline
